trans-unit.source: Controls whether channels listen synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Controla si los canales realizan escuchas de forma sincrónica o asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Use this behavior to instruct the channel listener to use a synchronous receive rather than the default, asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este comportamiento para indicar a la escucha del canal que utilice un receptor sincrónico en lugar del valor predeterminado, asincrónico.

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.SynchronousReceiveBehavior> instructs WCF to issue a new thread to pump for each accepted channel.
trans-unit.target: Usar <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.SynchronousReceiveBehavior> indica a WCF para emitir un nuevo subproceso para bombear para cada canal aceptado.

trans-unit.source: If there are a lot of channels there is the possibility of running out of threads.
trans-unit.target: Si hay muchos canales cabe la posibilidad de quedarse sin subprocesos.

trans-unit.source: You can also set this value using the [<synchronousReceive>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/synchronousreceive-element.md) in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: También puede establecer este valor utilizando la [ <synchronousReceive> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/synchronousreceive-element.md) en un archivo de configuración de aplicación.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.SynchronousReceiveBehavior" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.SynchronousReceiveBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to modify.
trans-unit.target: punto de conexión que se va a modificar.

trans-unit.source: The objects that binding elements require to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Objetos necesarios para que los elementos de enlace admitan el comportamiento.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented in this class.
trans-unit.target: No se implementa en esta clase.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection%29> for a description of the interface member that this class implements.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection%29> para una descripción del miembro de interfaz que esta clase implementa.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint that is to be customized.
trans-unit.target: punto de conexión que se va a personalizar.

trans-unit.source: The client runtime to be customized.
trans-unit.target: Tiempo de ejecución del cliente que debe personalizarse.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented in this class.
trans-unit.target: No se implementa en esta clase.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29> for a description of the interface member this class implements.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29> para una descripción del miembro de interfaz que esta clase implementa.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: punto de conexión que expone el contrato.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint dispatcher to be modified or extended.
trans-unit.target: Distribuidor del punto de conexión que se va a modificar o extender.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.ReceiveSynchronously" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.ReceiveSynchronously" /> como <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the `endpointDispatcher` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Produce una excepción si `endpointDispatcher` es `null`.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to validate.
trans-unit.target: punto de conexión que se va a validar.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented in this class.
trans-unit.target: No se implementa en esta clase.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> for a description of the interface member this class implements.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> para una descripción del miembro de interfaz que esta clase implementa.
